mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (name, no, gender, phone, id_card, is_college, address, degree, graduation_date, clazz_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{no}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{idCard}, #{isCollege}, #{address}, #{degree}, #{graduationDate}, #{clazzId})
mapper.select: SELECT case degree when 1 then '高中' when 2 then '大专' when 3 then '本科' when 4 then '硕士' when 5 then '博士' else '没写' end as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM student GROUP BY degree
SELECT c.name as className, COUNT(s.id) as studentCount FROM student s LEFT JOIN clazz c ON s.clazz_id = c.id GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY studentCount DESC
